summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, AWS) are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure spending in 2024/2025, driving sustained demand for GPUs. H100/A100 rental prices remain stable at $3.16/hr, indicating tight supply-demand dynamics. Concurrently, major model releases (Gemini 1.5 Pro) and rumors of GPT-5/Claude 3/Olympus signal accelerated innovation.
